text:
@mhdksafa Yes, but I need feedback.
Okla counts positive tests - 7,480 since March; 355 deaths; 6,166 have recovered.
Does this mean 13,646 had covid19?
And Gov. Stitt challenged recording Nursing home deaths excluding 5 days of records.
https://t.co/Zay8wqkOpG
